string.text: The job I have.
Hmm. And what kind of job? Looking for something? Or maybe have already found? Heard here good full...
I'm sorry, I can not tell, and no time.
Yes, you wait to run. Run more... And what have you found? I'm here too not just drag
This is my case, what I found.
Found the X18 documents, the bartender promised to pay well.
No, found nothing.
I do not know how to come back so, get out of here soon.
Nothing interesting was found by accident? They say here you can find information about the experiments. Well paid for it...
No, I have not found.
Yes?.. And if you think well? Not telling me anything?
No.
What kind of questions?
Are you threatening me?
To hell with all this information, I barely survived.
Well, run. Suddenly you find - I'm not far...

Look, buddy, I'm in this area has passed through the fire, anomalies and monsters and was still alive, as you can see! So don't tell me what to say and what is not. I came for the documents. And not leaving without them. If they are in front of you, then I suggest you to give them, otherwise you will remain in this pit forever! Got it?
Clear.

If you lie - you will have problems if you have something in mind - you will have problems if I throw some stuff - you will have problems. In short you have one big problem - you need to really try that would solve it! And now once again for the stupid: you found the documents?
That's good and next time watch your mouth. Now go. Suddenly you find - I'm not far...
The conversation is over, get out of the way.
I don't have any documents.
That's better, buddy. Now give me all the information I found. Every one of the document. And don't joke with me - otherwise it will be your last joke...
Wait you say! I'm in this hole not just roam around. Don't fool around, out found. Share if that...
Share I'm not going to.
Well, Well, piss off... but that's just one piece of advice - watch your step, don't trip, Stalker!
Are you threatening me?
Okay, okay, simmer down... Just curious, you are quick to the gun. No more questioning. Just be careful and all.
Documents means... that Is exactly what I came for, FYI. And now you'll pay me back and run where ran. Do you understand me?
game
Listen, buddy, don't bother me. Let's make a deal. I normally roll you will not regret it.
I listen to wkra need these documents. Let's see what you got - I think we agree...
It's dark in here, can't see shit. Burer around... why did I agree?! How you got here?
Go away Stalker

I can't stand when the conversation is interrupted. In short, I came for important documents. If you ever find out, or you will have problems. If you didn't find anything - go away and don't take my time
I can't stand when the conversation is interrupted! Out documents if you don't want to stay here forever
Will take into account.
